name: Tank Training Ground
description:
My first project has a game dev (developed with Lua and love2d) ! Take commands of a tank and destroy has many targets has you can !

-----

Hello new cadet and welcome to the army! We have scrap metal cobbled together by our technicians, nothing that can really hurt our tanks, they don't shoot anyway. Go immediately destroy as many as you can !

-----

Controls : WASD for moving, space for shooting and start the game. Restart with "r".

Game menu have a short control description for french users.
